b: when touches hand and is person.dev then is area.voters = 0
when told err then play error
when told vote then play win buzz
when touches hand and is person.voted = 0 then is area.voteb ++, is person.voted = 1, tell vote, become next
when touches hand and is person.voted = 1 then tell err
when starts then tell calc, become previous in .5
when touches hand and is person.dev then is area.votea ++
when touches hand and is person.dev then is area.voteb ++
when touches hand and is person.dev = 1 then play button click 2, is person.voted = 0

p.e:
[AREA.VOTERS VALUE] TOTAL VOTES
[AREA.VOTEA VALUE] VOTE A [AREA.VOTEAPCT VALUE]%
[AREA.VOTEB VALUE] VOTE B [AREA.VOTEBPCT VALUE]%

b: when told calc then is area.voters = (area.votea + area.voteb)
when told calc then is area.voteapct = (area.votea / area.voters) * 100
when told calc then is area.votebpct = (area.voteb / area.voters) * 100
when is area.voters = 0 then is area.voteapct = 0, is area.votebpct = 0
when touches hand and is person.dev then is area.votea --
when touches hand and is person.dev then is area.voteb --
when touches hand and is person.dev then is area.votea == 0, is area.voteb == 0, tell calc
when touches hand and is person.voted = 0 then is area.votea ++, is person.voted = 1, tell vote, become next
when touches hand and is person.voted = 1 then tell err
when starts then tell calc, become previous in .5
